channel.title: Paying 1m real rs for answer to question
channel.description: well im running off testscape source and everytime i change character rights and save it it seems to reset back to 0 even tho i am logged out and i change to char rights 2 i log in after that then im still regular player...help?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 09, 2006, 12:50:06 PM[/size][hr]bumping up to 1.1

item.source: Paying 1m real rs for answer to question

item.title: Paying 1m real rs for answer to question
item.dc:creator: @pinballwize pinballwize
item.description:
@pinballwize wrote:

[quote=“jamesmunnelly, post:4, topic:23505”]are you editing it in your charecter files or client.java

i do believe that with testscape you must do both.

step one: fine the username you want to admin in the folder characters

step two: change the character rights to the following

0 = normal player
1 = mod
2 = admin
3 = owner

now in client.java find the part about player rights search for somthing like

3 = owner

put your username in one of the already named players and change the player rights thing to any of the above things depending WARNING: Must be the same as what you made it in your charecter file.

Save, Compile and run the server (to compile run compile.bat)

James,[/quote]

omfg i love you thank yo uso much!!! this helped me alot!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Paying 1m real rs for answer to question
item.dc:creator: @xn00bxfrei69 xn00bxfrei69
item.description:
@xn00bxfrei69 wrote:

[quote=“0wn4g3 r4ngr, post:9, topic:23505”]OK, all of you are dead wrong. If you want to make yourself an admin on testscape, this is how you do it.

First, open up your client.java and search for:

start of moderator/admin list <<<<<<<<<<<< he deserves 1 mill lol… i was scrolling down going OMG noone done it yet 1mil to me then ures appeared and im like fuck you lol x.x

Then you should see something like this:

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("0wn4g3 r4ngr")) //name might be different { playerRights = 3; }

Change the name in the brackets and parentheses to your name, save, compile, done.[br][size=1]Posted at: November 09, 2006, 05:22:48 PM[/size][hr]Gimme my 1mil. lol[/quote][br][size=1]Posted at: November 14, 2006, 03:51:21 PM[/size][hr]Lol ffs how come you get 1mil… i was about to post how to do it… oh wait u forgot some!
hehe now i get to get 1mil[br][size=1]Posted at: November 14, 2006, 03:52:39 PM[/size][hr]Okay now…
search for this in client.java

 //start of moderator/admin list,

under that you should see this

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")) { playerRights = 3; }
Change admin to your player name…
Now save and go to characters folder
Delete the account name u made admin now compile and log in and CONGRATS U ARE ADMIN
(u can delete the file because that aint the save game… the save games are in savegames lol)

Read full topic
item.source: Paying 1m real rs for answer to question

item.title: Paying 1m real rs for answer to question
item.dc:creator: @jamesmunnelly jamesmunnelly
item.description:
@jamesmunnelly wrote:

sorry here is a full tut

Step One: Open up the playername you want to be admin

Step Two: Search for

character-rights = 0

Replace it with this

character-rights = 3

Step Three: Open Up client.java

Step Four: Search for

2 = staff, 3 = admin

You should see something like this:

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOURUSERNAMEHERE")) { playerRights = 3; }

Replace YOURUSERNAMEHERE with the username you edited earlier

Note: You must KEEP the "

Save, Close and compile

Note: If you made it

playerRights = 3;

You will not actually be able to see your crown but others will be able to see it.

Hope this helped.

James,

Read full topic

item.title: Paying 1m real rs for answer to question
item.dc:creator: @0wn4g3_r4ngr 0wn4g3 r4ngr
item.description:
@0wn4g3_r4ngr wrote:

OK, all of you are dead wrong. If you want to make yourself an admin on testscape, this is how you do it.

First, open up your client.java and search for:

start of moderator/admin list

Then you should see something like this:

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("0wn4g3 r4ngr")) //name might be different { playerRights = 3; }

Change the name in the brackets and parentheses to your name, save, compile, done.[br][size=1]Posted at: November 09, 2006, 05:22:48 PM[/size][hr]Gimme my 1mil. lol

Read full topic

item.title: Paying 1m real rs for answer to question
item.dc:creator: @william william
item.description:
@william wrote:

what u need to do is set ur compile to:

@echo off
title Ambusher
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe” server
pause

thats what my compiler is set to,

then set ur runserver.bat like this:

@echo off
title WILLIBUMSCAPE.NO-IP.ORG Server
java -Xmx2048m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause

note:willibumscape.no-ip.org is my server, delete this and put urs there

hope it works , my name is ferret boy1 xd

Read full topic
